text:
@SpeakerPelosi Shaming whoever wouldn't visit Chinatown during the Covid19 virus FEBRUARY 27,2020.  'You're a racist if you don't go unprotected into crowds in the USA' in FEBRUARY 27 2020 = a month after Trump banned China travel and formed the "Coronavirus Task Force"
https://t.co/gAnybZvacz
